ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: The Audio Technologies team is looking for an Acoustic Integration Engineer who will be responsible for supporting Apple’s Audio Products portfolio.

ul.li: The ideal candidate will have at least a Bachelor’s degree in Acoustics and some hands on experience in the headphone or loudspeaker industry. (e.g. – internships or work experience) The following skills are required:
Experience conducting acoustic measurements of headphones and earphones
Familiar with modern transducer and headphone architectures
Fluent in Matlab, Soundcheck and Solidworks
Strong troubleshooting, acoustic testing and data analysis skills
Strong individual contributor, motivated with a positive attitude

div.p: As an Integration Engineer based in Cupertino, you will have responsibilities spanning all aspects of acoustic HW design: Acoustic design responsibilities for new products concepts and prototypes Transducer specification/integration into product enclosures Working with cross functional teams and suppliers to deliver high quality results Support development build activities at contract manufacturers as needed Support broader acoustic team through prototyping, measurement and user studies
